summary: This bill, the "Countering Threats and Attacks on Our Judges Act," amends the State Justice Institute Act of 1984. It authorizes the State Justice Institute to provide funding to eligible organizations for establishing State judicial threat intelligence and resource centers. These centers would provide training, resources, and threat assessment services to improve judicial security, including coordinating with law enforcement, developing incident reporting, and creating a threat database. The bill mandates annual reports on threats to judges and court staff.
